page.title: 06COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: The{Post Office}in Southminster delivers to{2100}premises throughout the{Dengie Hundred.}It is the Sorting Office for{5 villages. At 5.45am the mail arrives from {Chelmsford}by road. It is sorted and delivered by{4 postmen, 4 par-time {postwomen}and a{part-time man}who travels a 23 mile round trip around the{Dengie Marshes. }Another delivery comes on the 10.20.am train from {London.}It is then distributed to provide a{second}delivery. There are{4 post boxes}in Southminster with two collections a day at{9.40am and{5.00pm. The Post Office provides many vital services. They pay out{Old Age Pension {Child Allowances}and{Unemployment {Benefits.}It is also a{savings bank. They sell postage{stamps, Car Tax,T.V. {Licences, Insurance Stamps.
